name: Christmas Doom
description: Well, Christmas is coming up so I thought what the hell, I'll make a Christmas music .WAD. :) I found a zip with a bunch of Christmas MIDs so I changed the instruments (mostly to distorted guitar and rock organs :) hehe) It can be quite funny fighting the Cyberdemon to the tune of `Santa Claus is Coming To Town' :). Anyway, this sounds OK on my GUS so give it a try and lemme know what you think.
